ActorTalk: Impressive... But are we going to keep watching like this?
Of course! I must learn the master's techniques down to the smallest detail!
Are they really putting... sugar... into the cold bitter gourd salad?
It must be some kind of secret recipe.
The sugar enhances the bitter gourd's flavor! Master, I get it now!
Wait a second, why is there sugar in the spicy stir-fried pork, too?
...Looks like they just grabbed the wrong seasoning.
